title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3822/92 of 28 December 1992 fixing the agricultural conversion rates
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3822/92  of 28 December 1992  fixing the agricultural conversion rates
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The agricultural conversion rates are fixed at:
ECU 1 =  Bfrs/Lfrs  48,5563   Dkr  8,97989   DM  2,35418   Dr  310,351   Pta  166,075   FF  7,89563  ÂŁ  IRL  0,878776   Lit  2 087,00   Fl  2,65256   Esc  209,523  ÂŁ   0,939052
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1993. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 December 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) See page 1 of this Official Journal.
